channel.title: Synapbook on Inertry
channel.description: Recent content in Synapbook on Inertry

item.title: 2019 04 02 Comparison of Evernote and Synapbook
item.description: Common features Cloud Synchronization enables you to access memo contents created by PC and mobile phone anywhere Data is stored locally so that it can be accessed even during fast search and network disconnection Supports sorting and tagging of notes Support for inserting images into notes Strengths of Evernote versus Synapbook iOS support Extremely powerful Web scrap functionality Content encryption support It is a stable application that has a long history and many users use it.

item.title: Official Synapbook V1.0 released
item.description: Finally upgraded the version to V1.0. We think it would be 8.0 or more so if we update the actual version with hundreds of releases, but we have not been able to upgrade the version since we have been operating in semi-private mode for about 2 years, and we have been beta-tagged like Google because of concerns about unstable There was also intention to operate. ;-) Now that we have switched to full public release because it’s time, we have revised the version to V1.
